bibl.title: Letter from Melvin D. Brewer to [Philip Showalter Hench?], January 24, 1941

div1.p: Brewer requests that [Hench?] complete the biographical questionnaire for the Washington and Jefferson Alumni catalogue.

div1.head: Letter from Melvin D. Brewer to [Philip Showalter Hench?], January 24, 1941

opener.dateline:
THE ALUMNI ASSOCIATION
OFFICE OF THE SECRETARY
WASHINGTON AND JEFFERSON COLLEGE
WASHINGTON, PENNSYLVANIA
January 24, 1941

div1.p:
This is an urgent call for you to help
us complete our preparations for publication of
a new biographical catalogue of Washington and
Jefferson Alumni.

Please fill out the enclosed question-
naire and return it to me at your earliest con-
venience.

We hope to have complete information on
every alumnus of the College and your coopera-
tion will be appreciated.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, Melvin D. Brewer
Alumni Secretary MDB/hvb
Enc. 2
